publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-984 Tommy Sheridan: Council Tax-That the Parliament agrees that the council tax should be abolished and replaced with an income-based alternative.
S2M-984 Tommy Sheridan: Council Tax-That the Parliament agrees that the council tax should be abolished and replaced with an income-based alternative.
S2M-984 Council Tax (lodged on 2 March 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Colin Fox*
S2M-984 Council Tax (lodged on 2 March 2004) Frances Curran*
